name: Woodland Wedding Chalice in Cast Bronze
description:
This solid bronze chalice makes for a wonderful wedding ceremony, or any ceremony for that matter! The chalice bowl is designed with leaves from the upper canopy of regional hardwoods and the base uses meadow grasses and flowers all collected from our property in Vermont. The union of the botanicals makes for a wonderful symbol of marriage and will remain a keepsake long after the ceremony is over.
This chalice was cast in the "lost wax" method and hand finished to achieve it's deep luster.
It measures 6 1/2 " ( 16.5 cm) tall and 4 1/4 " (10.8 cm) wide and weighs 3 pounds (1.36 kg).

An unsealed bronze surface is alive and develops it's own rich patina with time. Your natural oils enhance it. It loves to be touched.
Bronze is forever!

Ask about engraving!

We can design and hand cast custom chalices for any occasion - please convo us for information.

FREE bronze trilobite with every order as our thank you!

To learn more about the "lost wax" process we use, please visit www.cpisculpture.com.



Copyright © 2010. All rights reserved

name: Cast Bronze Acorns - Set of Three
description:
These adorable bronze acorns are truly a special gift from mother nature. A symbol of luck, prosperity, youthfulness and power these beauties can be grouped anywhere around the house. They are dense, solid and feel great in the hand. We love having them next to our computer to play with while we ponder. Unique home accent!
The largest two are 1 1/ 4" (3.2cm) and the smaller one 3/4" (2 cm) and they all come tucked into a black velvet pouch.

Ships quick!

An unsealed bronze surface is alive and develops it's own rich patina with time. Your natural oils enhance it. It loves to be touched. Bronze is forever!

We offer multiples on this item for weddings as favors or table decor. 
Please convo us for prices and options.

FREE bronze trilobite with every order as our thank you!

Ships fast!

To find out more about our "lost wax" casting method, please visit our foundry website at www.cpisculpture.com


Copyright © 2010. All rights reserved

name: Nautical Art Necklace -Intertwining Seahorses
description:
This art necklace is fashioned after our sculpture "If Wishes Were Horses" and certainly makes a bold and unique jewelry statement! 
The two sea horses are cast in solid bronze, their tails intertwining to create a heart and their mouths just about to touch. A dramatic accent to any outfit and a wonderful show of support for our treasured seas.
They are approximately 2 1/2" tall (6.35 cm) and 2 1/2"wide (6.35 cm) and they hang on a 14"(35.56 cm) antique brass rolo chain finished with a lobster claw closure. The chain is smooth and substantial and the piece lies comfortably about 1 1/2" below the crook of the neck. 
This necklace arrives tucked in a handmade black velvet pouch.

FREE bronze trilobite with every order as our thank you!

An unsealed bronze surface is alive and develops it's own rich patina with time. Your natural oils enhance it. It loves to be touched!


To find out more about our "lost wax" casting method, please visit our foundry website at www.cpisculpture.com

Copyright © 2010. All rights reserved

name: The Tinder Pipe
description:
This unique fireside tool is used to deliver a blast of air deep into a fire, igniting smoldering coals and embers. The cast bronze portrait of old man winter has been meticulously sculpted and the copper tube has a rich multicolored patina with a beautiful rolled copper lip. This is one tool sure to become a favorite!


The Tinder Pipe measures 36" (91.44cm) long, 1"(2.5cm) in diameter and comes tucked into it's own brown microsuede pouch.
Makes a unique gift.

FREE bronze trilobite with every order as our thank you!



To find out more about our "lost wax" casting method, please visit our foundry website at www.cpisculpture.com
